entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DotNet doesn't respect encoding of Chinese strings? #96348
  • Migration from .NET Framework 4.7.2 to .NET 8 results in StackOverflowException due to reduced stack size #96347
  • Add support for Arm64EC platform for COM based addins #96342

Closed

  • About additionalAssemblyPaths in .runtimeconfig.json #96133
  • Fix fragility in setup-stress-dependencies infra #10481
    Future
  • Deflate returning different results from net40 #96343
  • The native aot DLL library for redirecting methods. #96345
  • Reflection free mode: using sqlclient - possible options for obfuscation #96339
  • Pathological performance degradation with a specific regex using `Regex.Match` #96340

PullRequests

Created

  • [IGNORE] Investigating impact of a change. #96350
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • riscv64 is now upstream Debian architecture #96349
    community-contribution, needs-area-label

Merged

  • A few optimizations for the gcinfodecoder construction #96150
    tenet-performance, area-VM-coreclr
  • Clean up testgrouping.proj and move JIT/Intrinsics under JIT.1 #96333
    area-Infrastructure
  • fix `dependency` typo #96346
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Creation of non-suspendable threads does not need to synchronize with the caller. #96338
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Merge remaining JIT tests #94444
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Change Native AOT ThreadBuffer.m_threadId to OS thread id #96120
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Allow specifying IndentCharacter and IndentSize when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add runtime module address to SpecialDiagInfo block in createdump and fix missing DotNetRuntimeDebugHeader export #96121
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] Faster lookup for method infos on Windows. #96283
    os-windows, tenet-performance, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95853
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-author-action
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Enhance OSX's ProcessManager to extract process names from their paths #96287
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Improve branch optimizer around implied relops #95234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [wip] [mono] Enable some of the disabled JIT/Directed/callconv/ runtime tests #96243
    needs-area-label
  • [LoongArch64] add LoongArch64's SIMD128/256 instructions within emitter. #95456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • `dotnet restore` unable to fetch https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json, times out #37673

Updated

  • PackageInstall.Tests timeout known build error #36192
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • [API Compat] add rule to make sure struct fields follow LayoutKind #26460
    Backlog
  • NativeAOT: Allow *completely static* executables to be built on Linux (Alpine) #37643
  • add output format support for dotnet tool list command #37239
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2342269 #37680
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update global.json #37672
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2342091 #37654
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37543
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Swap 9.0 to current target framework #37609
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Treat rtm as stable Fixes #36500 #37160
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • init tool list format option #37394
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • add devcontainer support #37412
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • The auto generated async enumerator types implement IAsyncEnumerator public interface methods as private #71406

Updated

  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.workspaces.workspacesnetcore.projectproperties (vs2022) #64672
    Backlog
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.csharp.csharperrorlistnetcore.errorlist #61367
    17.6 P3
  • LanguageServerCleansUpOnUnexpectedJsonRpcDisconnectAsync is flaky #69465
    17.8
  • MacOS Rolling builds crashing in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.UnitTests #71241
  • invokenavigatetoforgeneratedfile_infolder failures #69686
  • newintegrationtests.csharp.csharpaddmissingreference.verifyavailablecodeactions (vs2022) #64807
  • FixAllOccurrencesIgnoresGeneratedCode is flaky #56625
    Backlog
  • Null reference exception in code fix provider for IDE0045 #71403
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.csharp.csharpargumentprovider.fullcycle is flaky #66597
    17.6
  • Code fix for IDE0028 produces invalid collection expression #71240
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.visualbasic.basicargumentprovider.fullcycle is flaky #66596
    17.6
  • BasicArgumentProvider.ImplicitArgumentSwitching is flaky #66533
    17.6
  • Code cleanup rules are way too aggressive #66905
    17.6
  • [Regression] False positive in nullable analysis of local functions #71419

PullRequests

Created

  • Params Collections - Adjust binding in presence of dynamic arguments #71421
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Bug fix #71403 #71420
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Use CPS for tests where saving documents needs to be reliable #70983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • [Inline Rename] Update the UI related to Copilot #71332
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: method type re-inference #71214
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Collection expressions: synthesize singleton list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #71147
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • WIP: OOP calls with different snapshots. #71391
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • #66116 Long switch expression is duplicated in InferTypesWorker_DoNot… #71412
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Only apply one document info change for linked documents #71220
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Record metrics using System.Diagnostics.Metrics #53050
  • /signin-oidc does not unset nonce and correlation cookies with param error=login_required from failed identity server prompt=none request #53048
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #53046
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #53045
  • A way to modify prerendered page html #53044
  • After using JsonWebTokenHandler in. net8, when SaveSigninToken=true is set, BootstrapContext is always null #53043
  • Blazor Web App Client not registering a service/ DI not working #53042
  • quickgrid blazorwebassmelby with .net8.0 #53041
  • NavigationException when attempting to navigate after submitting a form #49143 still continue #53040
  • Blazor SSR incorrect DOM patching for checkbox/radio controls #53039
  • Unexpected exception: HRESULT 0x8007023e returned at D:\a\_work\1\s\src\Servers\IIS\AspNetCoreModuleV2\InProcessRequestHandler\inprocessapplication.cpp:268 #53036

Closed

  • Remove call UseRouting #53018
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #53037
  • Perf regression: fortunes #53038
  • Blazor WebAssembly throws: No .NET call dispatcher has been set. #51258
    .NET 9 Planning
  • HtmlHelperOptions.CheckBoxHiddenInputRenderMode is ignored #53025
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, multiple_queries, plaintext #53010
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #53031
  • How to remove ActionId and ActionName from log messages? #52361
  • Invalid html markup string throws unhandled exception in Blazor webassembly and Maui #52888
  • Implement WebAssembly (WASM) Support for Improved Frontend Performance #52934

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix up formatting for generic types with nullable args #53049
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [release/8.0] Fix handling of default values in RDG #53047
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0.x

Updated

  • Avoid setting incompatible default value for StringValue sources #52895
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Add explicit null checks on ObjectPool.Return rather than triggering random failures later on #52935
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add polymorphic support to SignalR STJ #53035
    area-signalr
  • Speed up ILEmitTrie jump table using Binary Search Tree #52928
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty and ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #52897
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] Fix SSR page rendering intermediate state instead of the end state of components #52943
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Hybrid builds crash on older Macs #19613
  • Picking functions TapGestureRecognizer & GetVisualTreeElements(point) have been improved in .NET 8.0 but both still cannot find a Border with no BackgroundColor #19612
  • [iOS] Shell Back Button Label #19610
  • Win: Button clicked event and command will not be occurred in EmptyView of CollectionView #19609
  • [WinUI] Image with FontImageSource is not displayed properly when using a custom font in an unpackaged app #19608
  • [Android] - Font icons and image issue on release #19607
  • Many Controls end up preventing Garbage Collection #19606

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.3] Splash screen no longer working in .Net 8 Maui #19200
  • Border Stoke data binding does not work #19201
  • .Net Maui8 VisualElement.TranslateTo() runs incorrectly #19311
  • IWindow.DisplayDensityChanged not firing on Mac Catalyst / iOS #5315
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI CarouselView Items Not Visible in Release Mode #19357
  • Collection view + popups performance, bug or as is? #19433
  • PlatformBehaviour OnAttachedTo not called for ImageButtons with both HeightRequest and WidthRequest set on iOS #19511
  • so many times i have installed in my windows 11 i am getting this errors #19518

PullRequests

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19577
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
